attributes.action: Introduce online voting to improve voter turnouts at local and general elections
attributes.additional_details: enact legislation allowing online voting for all, during general and local elections.
attributes.background: We want parliament to introduce legislation to implement our idea of online voting. We believe that this will significantly improve voter turnouts, especially amongst younger voters.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce online voting in General Elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/708622
